SELECT IF( SUM( INNE.total_price + INNE.comm + INNE.ano_comm - ( (INNE.total_price + INNE.comm + INNE.ano_comm) * INNE.ss_commission / 100) ) IS NULL, 0, SUM( INNE.total_price + INNE.comm + INNE.ano_comm - ( (INNE.total_price + INNE.comm + INNE.ano_comm) * INNE.ss_commission / 100) )
) AS or_total_price, INNE.dates AS or_user_column1 FROM ( SELECT ss.ss_name, ss.ss_commission, SUM(od.or_total_price) AS total_price, SUM(od.or_payment_commision) AS comm, SUM(od.or_another_payment_commision) AS ano_comm, DATE_FORMAT(od.or_sending_day, '%Y-%m') AS dates
FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON od.ss_fk = ss.ss_pk WHERE
or_sending_day >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 3 MONTH) , '%Y-%m') AND or_sending_day < DATE_FORMAT(NOW() , '%Y-%m')
AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0 AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 0 GROUP BY ss.ss_name, ss.ss_commission, dates ) INNE GROUP BY INNE.dates ORDER BY INNE.dates ASC

SELECT IF( SUM( INNE.total_price + INNE.comm + INNE.ano_comm - ( (INNE.total_price + INNE.comm + INNE.ano_comm) * INNE.ss_commission / 100) ) IS NULL, 0, SUM( INNE.total_price + INNE.comm + INNE.ano_comm - ( (INNE.total_price + INNE.comm + INNE.ano_comm) * INNE.ss_commission / 100) ) ) AS or_total_price, DATE_FORMAT(dc.dc_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS or_user_column1 FROM ( SELECT ss.ss_name, ss.ss_commission, SUM(od.or_total_price) AS total_price, SUM(od.or_payment_commision) AS comm, SUM(od.or_another_payment_commision) AS ano_comm, DATE_FORMAT(od.or_sending_day, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dates
FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON od.ss_fk = ss.ss_pk WHERE
or_sending_day >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW() , '%Y-%m') AND or_sending_day < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) , '%Y-%m')
AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0 AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 0 GROUP BY ss.ss_name, ss.ss_commission, dates ) INNE RIGHT JOIN dummy_calendar dc ON dc.dc_date = INNE.dates WHERE
dc.dc_date >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW() , '%Y-%m') AND dc.dc_date < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) , '%Y-%m')
GROUP BY dc.dc_date ORDER BY dc.dc_date DESC
